actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from EPA, OMB.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to allow all recipients of grants for treatment works to use dedicated ad valorem taxes in order to meet the requirement of the Act that such recipients adopt user charges to pay for operation and maintenance of treatment works.
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act (also known as the Clean Water Act) to allow all recipients of grants for treatment works to use dedicated ad valorem taxes to meet the requirement that such recipients adopt user charges to pay for operation and maintenance of treatment works.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to allow all recipients of grants for treatment works to use dedicated ad valorem taxes in order to meet the requirement of the Act that such recipients adopt user charges to pay for operation and maintenance of treatment works.
